statements: SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, creation_date FROM smart_contracts WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT contract_id, creator_address FROM smart_contracts WHERE creator_address = '0x123456789';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE creation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT contract_name, bytecode FROM smart_contracts WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_name, creator_address FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE creator_address LIKE '0x%' AND is_active = TRUE;
SELECT contract_name, creation_date FROM smart_contracts WHERE bytecode IS NOT NULL ORDER BY creation_date ASC, contract_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, creator_name FROM smart_contracts WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM contract_transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2021-05-01';
SELECT contract_name, creator_name, creation_date FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts WHERE creator_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_name, creator_name FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY creator_name DESC;
SELECT contract_name, creator_name, creation_date FROM smart_contracts WHERE creator_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY creation_date ASC;

SELECT contract_name, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM smart_contracts JOIN contract_transactions ON smart_contracts.contract_id = contract_transactions.contract_id GROUP BY contract_name HAVING transaction_count > 5;

SELECT contract_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM smart_contracts JOIN contract_transactions ON smart_contracts.contract_id = contract_transactions.contract_id GROUP BY contract_name ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, deploy_date FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY deploy_date DESC;
SELECT contract_address, contract_platform FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_platform = 'Ethereum';
SELECT MAX(amount) AS highest_amount FROM contract_transactions;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM contract_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT contract_address, contract_name, contract_platform FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT * FROM contract_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM contract_transactions GROUP BY sender_address, receiver_address;
SELECT contract_address, event_name, event_description FROM contract_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT contract_address, COUNT(event_id) AS num_events FROM contract_events GROUP BY contract_address HAVING num_events > 5 ORDER BY num_events DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, deploy_date FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY deploy_date DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_address FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT owner_name, contract_name FROM contract_owners INNER JOIN smart_contracts ON contract_owners.contract_id = smart_contracts.contract_id;
SELECT event_name, event_description, event_date FROM contract_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT contract_name, deploy_date FROM smart_contracts WHERE deploy_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.contract_name, o.owner_name FROM smart_contracts c JOIN contract_owners o ON c.contract_id = o.contract_id;
SELECT ce.event_name, ce.event_description, ce.event_date, c.contract_name FROM contract_events ce LEFT JOIN smart_contracts c ON ce.contract_id = c.contract_id;

SELECT ct.transaction_id, ct.amount, sc.contract_name, ct.transaction_date FROM contract_transactions ct INNER JOIN smart_contracts sc ON ct.contract_id = sc.contract_id WHERE ct.amount > 1000 ORDER BY ct.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM contracts;
SELECT contract_name, creation_date FROM contracts WHERE creator_address = '0x123456789';
SELECT contract_id, event_type, event_description FROM contract_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT account_address, balance FROM contract_balances WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT function_name, function_description FROM contract_functions WHERE contract_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT contract_name, creation_date FROM contracts
SELECT * FROM contract_events WHERE event_type='payment' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC
SELECT transition_name, to_state FROM contract_transitions WHERE contract_id=1234
SELECT contract_id, account_address, balance FROM contract_balances WHERE balance > 1000
SELECT function_name, function_description, function_code FROM contract_functions
